snippet: The New York Times is updating its traditional facsimile of the Declaration of Independence on the Fourth of July with a higher-resolution version, accompanied by a transcription.
abstract: The New York Times is updating its facsimile of the Declaration of Independence that appears each year in the Fourth of July issue with a higher-resolution version, accompanied by a transcription.
lead_paragraph: The New York Times is updating its traditional facsimile of the Declaration of Independence on the Fourth of July with a higher-resolution version, accompanied by a transcription.

headline.seo: A Clearer Facsimile of the Declaration of Independence
headline.main: A Clear Declaration of Intent Is Now Even Clearer
headline.print_headline: A Clear Declaration of Intent Is Now Even Clearer
